# 1 TALLY TRAINING PROVIDER IN DHAKA

We provide people quality training on Tally Erp 9. Whether you’re a professional corporate working in some company or a complete newbie in the accounting field we will teach you A-Z of this simultaneous multi-lingual business accounting & inventory management software.

Get Admitted

Training Methods

for individuals

This is one on one training. If you want personal training this is for you.

Group Training

There will be a group training and a certain number of people will be in it.

Online Training

The whole training will be conducted online. You can learn from your home.

Tally.ERP 9 Training outline

Accounting

All the necessary things required in managing a company’s account section are included in this section. This is an all in one accounting solution for you.

Inventory Management

From preparing balance & trial sheet to cash flow you need to know to handle inventory will be taught here. Managing inventory will be a piece of cake after this.

Payroll Management

Managing payrolls are one of the most crucial and important part of a company. That very thing is shown in this section. Everything related to payments will be conducted here.
